skills.name: Roundhouse Kick
skills.description: Kicks an enemy and stuns the target for 1 turn with a 35% chance.

skill_effect.name: Stun
skill_effect.description: Enemy is stunned and immobilized for a number of turns

skills.name: Combo Attack
skills.description: Attacks an enemy 3 times. Each attack has a 20% chance to decrease the enemy's Defense for 2 turns. Instantly gains another turn with a 30% chance after the attack.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +5%
Damage +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +15%
Cooltime Turn -1

skill_effect.name: Multiple Hits
skill_effect.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.

skills.name: Challenging Strike
skills.description: Attacks the enemy and taunts the target for 2 turns. The damage of this skill will increase according to your MAX HP.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +5%
Damage +10%
Damage +10%
Cooltime Turn -1
Cooltime Turn -1

skill_effect.name: Provoke
skill_effect.description: The monster is forced to only attack the monster which applied the effect

skills.multiplier_formula: 2.4*<mark>ATK</mark> + 0.3*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Attacker's HP in raw hit points">MAX HP</mark>
